title: 2 Pcs Men's Fleece Printed Hoodie Track Suit - 02
description:
Description: Stay stylish and comfortable with this trendy printed hood track suit designed for modern men. Perfect for workouts, casual outings, or lounging in style ? this outfit gives a perfect blend of fashion and function
? Gender: Men's
? Fabric: Fleece
? Pattern: Printed
? Neck Type: Hooded Neck
? Sizes: Small, Medium, Large, X-Large
? Number Of Pieces: 2 Pcs
? Package Includes: 1 x Hoodie Track Suit
? Shirt Length: 25 Inches
? Shirt Chest: 19 Inches
? Shirt Shoulder: 5 Inches
? Arm Length: 23 Inches
? Trouser Length: 41 Inches
? Trouser Waist: 34 Inches
? Shorts Length: 25 Inches
? Trouser Hip: 34 Inches
? Color: Black
? Key Features:
? ? Stylish Printed Design: Eye-catching prints that add a modern and sporty vibe.
? ? Attached Hood: Keeps you cozy and adds a trendy streetwear touch.
? ? Comfort Fit Track Pants: Designed for all-day comfort with an elastic waistband.
? ? Soft & Breathable Fabric: Ensures easy movement and comfort during workouts or casual wear.
? ? Easy to Wash & Durable: Retains color and shape even after multiple washes.
? Ideal For: Gym, jogging, travel, or everyday wear.
? Available Sizes: S, M, L, XL
? Note: There might be an error of 1-3 cm due to manual measurement, and slight color differences may occur as a result of varying lighting and monitor effects.
? Product Code: MZ1009200062RN
